mapper.insert:
select alf_prop_class_seq.NEXTVAL as value from dual
insert into alf_prop_class (id, java_class_name, java_class_name_short, java_class_name_crc) values (#{id}, #{javaClassName}, #{javaClassNameShort}, #{javaClassNameCrc})

select alf_prop_string_value_seq.NEXTVAL as value from dual
insert into alf_prop_string_value (id, string_value, string_end_lower, string_crc) values (#{id}, #{stringValue}, #{stringEndLower}, #{stringCrc})

select alf_prop_double_value_seq.NEXTVAL as value from dual
insert into alf_prop_double_value (id, double_value) values (#{id}, #{doubleValue})

select alf_prop_ser_value_seq.NEXTVAL as value from dual
insert into alf_prop_serializable_value (id, serializable_value) values (?, ?)

select alf_prop_value_seq.NEXTVAL as value from dual
insert into alf_prop_value (id, actual_type_id, persisted_type, long_value) values (#{id}, #{actualTypeId}, #{persistedType}, #{longValue})

insert.selectKey: select alf_prop_root_seq.NEXTVAL as value from dual
select alf_prop_unique_ctx_seq.NEXTVAL as value from dual
